header.title: Share sensitive information securely using links.
header.subtitle: Our tool that lets you share sensitive information with your colleagues or friends more securely with time-limited links. Everything is encrypted (end-to-end) and completely anonymous. We are using secure techniques as OWASP, RSA and AES-256. No more sending plain passwords via messages!

progress.encryptingYourDataForTransmissionUsingRS: Encrypting your data for transmission using RSA keys

encryptForm.progressDoneText: Your content has been encrypted and stored securely for 3 days. After this time it will be automatically and irretrievably deleted. You can now copy the link and when you open it, your content will be securely displayed.

decryptForm.title: Successfully decrypted link content
decryptForm.countdown: This link and content will be permanently deleted
